dir=\"auto\"\u003eThe easiest way to get started with color conversion in ac-colors is by creating a Color object. The constructor takes  an object with up to four deconstructed properties which help determine how to convert and format color output:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul dir=\"auto\"\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003ccode\u003ecolor\u003c/code\u003e: An array (or string if \u003ccode\u003etype\u003c/code\u003e is hex) containing the three numbers for the color (ex. [r,g,b]). Defaults to \u003ccode\u003e[0,0,0]\u003c/code\u003e.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003ccode\u003etype\u003c/code\u003e: The format for the color being inputted. A full list of types can be found \u003ca href=\"#type\"\u003ebelow\u003c/a\u003e. Defaults to \u003ccode\u003e\"rgb\"\u003c/code\u003e.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003ccode\u003eprecision\u003c/code\u003e: The number of decimals to be outputted from the string output methods. Defaults to \u003ccode\u003e3\u003c/code\u003e.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003ccode\u003ecapitalize\u003c/code\u003e: A boolean flag for whether or not to capitalize the string output. Defaults to \u003ccode\u003etrue\u003c/code\u003e.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto\" dir=\"auto\" 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div><p dir="auto">The easiest way to get started with color conversion in ac-colors is by creating a Color object. The constructor takes  an object with up to four deconstructed properties which help determine how to convert and format color output:</p><ul dir="auto"><li><code>color</code>: An array (or string if <code>type</code> is hex) containing the three numbers for the color (ex. [r,g,b]). Defaults to <code>[0,0,0]</code>.</li><li><code>type</code>: The format for the color being inputted. A full list of types can be found <a href="#type">below</a>. Defaults to <code>"rgb"</code>.</li><li><code>precision</code>: The number of decimals to be outputted from the string output methods. Defaults to <code>3</code>.</li><li><code>capitalize</code>: A boolean flag for whether or not to capitalize the string output. Defaults to <code>true</code>.</li></ul><div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="// Node.js users will need to import the moduleconst Color = require("ac-colors");let black = new Color();console.log(black.hex); // #000000"><pre><span class="pl-c">// Node.js users will need to import the module</span><span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-v">Color</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-en">require</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"ac-colors"</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span><span class="pl-k">let</span> <span class="pl-s1">black</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-v">Color</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span><span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">log</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">black</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">hex</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span> <span class="pl-c">// #000000</span></pre></div><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><code>color</code></h3><a id="user-content-color" class="anchor-element" aria-label="Permalink: color" href="#color"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div><p dir="auto">The <code>color</code> property is usually a three element array containing the three RGB, HSL, LAB, XYZ, LUV, LCHuv, or LCHab digits, but can also be a string containing a 3 or 6 digit hexcode. The default color, <code>[0,0,0,]</code> evaluates to black when used with the default type of <code>"rgb"</code>.</p><div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="let red = new Color({"color":[255,0,0]});console.log(red.rgbString); // RGB(255, 0, 0)"><pre><span class="pl-k">let</span> <span class="pl-s1">red</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-v">Color</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-s">"color"</span>:<span class="pl-kos">[</span><span class="pl-c1">255</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span><span class="pl-c1">0</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span><span class="pl-c1">0</span><span class="pl-kos">]</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span><span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">log</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">red</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">rgbString</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span> <span class="pl-c">// RGB(255, 0, 0)</span></pre></div><p dir="auto">Hex colors can be specified with 3 or six digits and with or without the leading '#'.</p><div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="let grey = new Color({"color":"#333","type":"hex"});console.log(grey.hsl); // [0, 0, 20]"><pre><span class="pl-k">let</span> <span class="pl-s1">grey</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> (Default)</li><li><code>"hex"</code></li><li><code>"hsl"</code></li><li><code>"xyz"</code></li><li><code>"lab"</code></li><li><code>"lchab"</code></li><li><code>"luv"</code></li><li><code>"lchuv"</code></li></ul><p dir="auto">The type merely specifies the format of the incoming color. Once the type is specified, all of the below <a href="#color-object-properties">properties</a> will be set.</p><div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto"
